items.name: Armor Attachment Pack
items.description: Armor Attachment Pack is a Tier 3  Tech needed for the Alteration Bench that allows Prospectors to alter their armor pieces with Attachment Packs .

items.name: Armored Saddle
items.description: The Armored Saddle is a saddle for Mounts that has a medieval aesthetic. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC and is a cosmetic change to the Basic Riding Saddle that provides no additional attributes.

items.name: Ashen Drake Vestige
items.description: Ashen Drake Vestiges are used at the Trophy Bench to create an Ashen Drake Trophy , which can help prospectors complete the Bestiary .

items.name: Bear Vestige
items.description: Bear Vestiges are used at the Trophy Bench to create a Bear Trophy , which can help prospectors complete the Bestiary . They are also used at the Advanced Textiles Bench / Electric Textiles Bench to make Bear Rugs . Decorative purposes aside, both provide a boost to coziness, which increases the duration and effect of the Well Rested Buff .

items.name: Brown Bear Arm Armor
items.description: Brown Bear Armor is an upgrade to Bone Armor , offering higher physical resistance with a boost to melee attack speed. Though it may not increase attack damage, it pairs well with the Calibrated Grip Attachment s and Attack Speed Attachment s, further increasing knife attack speed.

items.name: Exotic Harvester
items.description: The Exotic Harvester is used to extract Volatile Raw Exotics from Volatile Raw Exotic deposits. Requires 1,500 k Wh to operate.

items.name: First Cohort Envirosuit
items.description: As part of the ICARUS: Supporters Edition (unavailable for purchase), prospectors received an exclusive UDA envirosuit with a built-in water slot – giving an edge to prospectors who dare pursue fortune on the moon's surface. There’s no better way to show your commitment than to wear it with pride. The First Cohort Envirosuit is researched and crafted in the Workshop on the Space Station .

items.name: Fur Arms Armor
items.description: Fur armor is a sidegrade to Leather Armor , offering slightly less physical resistance in exchange for a major boost to cold resistance, making it a necessity when venturing into cold regions. It, however, greatly reduces resistance to heat, making it problematic when delving into hotter biomes.

items.name: LM Beastmaster Arm Armor
items.description: The LM Beastmaster Arm Armor is part of the LM Beastmaster Armor Set , which can be unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. The armor set comes with buffs to Mounts and tamed creatures.

items.name: Larkwell "Bulwark" Envirosuit
items.description: The Larkwell "Bulwark" Envirosuit offers more resistance to cold/hot environments with the added bonus of exposure resistance, making it a decent upgrade to the Shengong 'Bihu' Envirosuit and the Shengong 'Dongtian' Envirosuit . Requires Red Exotics .

items.name: Larkwell "Haulier" Envirosuit
items.description: Despite the Larkwell "Haulier" Envirosuit not having a water slot, Prospectors adore this Envirosuit for its larger inventory size and mod-ability. Requires Red Exotics .

items.name: Scorpion Arms Armor
items.description: Scorpion Arms Armor is a Tier 2  crafted armor requiring a Textiles Bench ; however, it is difficult to acquire due to the challenge of defeating Husk: Extermination and requiring Scorpion Carapace . It has unique set bonuses for returning damage to the attacker and has one of the highest physical resistances in the game.

items.name: Suit Conditioning Module
items.description: This module increases the user's resistance to cold/hot environments, reducing the chances of Hypothermia/Hyperthermia. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Station in the Workshop . Multiple Suit Conditioning Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further increase the users cold/heat resistance.
